version.added: images are now centered in the window

version.removed: code borrowed from AllowRightClick (to prevent conflicts between the two extensions)

version.fixed: images in cache won't trigger onload

version.removed: stop dragging on pointer out of browser

version.changed: if modifier keys are pressed, ignore the keyboard event

version.added: fr-FR, ja-JP, nl-NL, pl-PL and pt-BR locales

version.changed: zoom factor now stored as string to allow floating point values
other changes I can't recall right now ;-)

version.fixed: addressed failed review suggestions - ImageTweak is now out of the sandbox!

version.changed: prevent the image from moving outside the viewport (extension.imagetweak.clip_movement pref)
version.added: ability to (manually) perform drag'n'drop (hold ctrl before start dragging)
ability to choose the default zoom type
ability to place image in the top left corner of the window (pixel and fill modes)
few comments here and there XD

version.fixed: autoscroll does not work on regular pages after viewing image (http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=4337705#p4337705)

version.changed: disabled logging that was left enabled when 0.17 was released

version.fixed: infinite loop when displaying images smaller than window with both 1:1 and free mode disabled (http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=4918365#p4918365)
firefox's builtin page-zoom has been disabled
version.added: support for ImageDocument inside frames and iframes
0 and ctrl+0 reset the view to the default one
"Press F1 for help" in pref window
open image in new tab (ctrl+alt+right-click) (suggestion by rob hino)
open image in new tab and focus (shift+ctrl+alt+right-click)
version.changed: clip_movement pref is now a integer to allow for soft movement clipping (values: 0-3)
event.detail handling in OnMouseWheel (workaround for sysnumlines issue)

todo.changed: deep changes on how the extension works (fixed viewport to moving viewport)
